summary.p: Returns a four-character (SOUNDEX) code to evaluate the similarity of two strings.

param.name: text
param.p: A string for which to generate a SOUNEX code for.

remarks.p: SOUNDEX converts a string to a four-character code to find similar-sounding words or names. The first character of the code is the first character of text and the second through fourth characters of the code are numbers. Vowels in text are ignored unless they are the first letter of the string.
